headline: The Trump Trade Is Back. There's Still Money To Be Made In These 3 Hot Sectors.
summary: The trick for investors with Trump's trade policies is to look at the charts to find the sectors benefiting the most from shifting political tides.

headline: PNC Executives to Speak at Goldman Sachs Financial Services Conference
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE: PNC) announced today that Chairman and Chief Executive Officer William S. Demchak and Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Robert Q. Reilly will discuss business performance and strategy at 1:00 p.m. (ET), Tuesday, Dec. 10, at the Goldman Sachs Financial Services Conference in New York City.

headline: PNC Financial price target raised to $235 from $200 at Citi
summary: Citi analyst Keith Horowitz raised the firm’s price target on PNC Financial (PNC) to $235 from $200 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. PNC remains well positioned with fixed asset repricing tailwinds, opportunity for loan growth and momentum in fees with exposure to cap markets and private equity activity, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Citi continues to see sales upside and with low credit risk and expects PNC to outperform credit expectations. Published first on TheFly – th
